title: Pete's Dragon

text: - In pursuit of a...- A dragon! It's a dragon!
title: Pete's Dragon

text: You can't say dragon over the radio!
title: Pete's Dragon

text: - Hey, pull over!- Not a chance!
title: Pete's Dragon

text: - He's not slowing down.- He's not stopping.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: - He'll stop.- The fool's out of his mind.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: Okay, hang on tight.We're gonna have to do this another way.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: To Pete, love Mommy and Daddy.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: But I don't wanna leave you.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: MEACHAM: No one ever sawthat dragon again.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: And I never told another tale about it.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: I didn't have to.Not after that day.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: Folks look high and low,but it was nowhere to be found.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: Some said he flew to anotherforest, far, far away.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: Time march on, children got older.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: By the by, even the best onescome to an end.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: But I know someone who wouldtell you otherwise.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: There's one little boy whocould tell you the whole story.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: He could even tell you what happens next.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: He knows that the North Starshines brightest of all.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: He knows that there's magic in the woods.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: If you know where to look for.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: He knows his dragon is still out there.
title: Pete's Dragon

text: And maybe, if you're lucky,that same boy,
title: Pete's Dragon

text: the bravest boy I've ever met,
title: Pete's Dragon

text: he could tell you where to find them.
